title: Magick's Cucumber
description: Dear Author,His lover always loved to experiment in the kitchen, but that latest recipe must have gone wrong, or why else would it have turned him into a baby? And now, on top of it all, his mother is calling and demanding to speak to him.This story was written as a part of the M/M Romance Group's "Love is Always Write" event. Group members were asked to write a story prompt inspired by a photo of their choice. Authors of the group selected a photo and prompt that spoke to them and wrote a short story.Read the story here or find it in Love Is Always Write: Volume 6.__________Genre: paranormalTags: contemporary; family drama; mage/sorcerer; non-explicit; established couple; humorous; magic users; HEAWord Count: 3,324
author: H.A. Caine
